title: Strength
lyrics:
*Blac Youngsta talking *
I don't need no negative vibes around me
If you on any negativity, stay away from round me
May GOD be wit' you, may GOD be wit' me
You, me, them, us, we

Strength

Grandma, she got

Strength

Mama, she got

Strength

And my auntie, she got

Strength

Stickin' together we'll have

Strength

We can unify

Strength

If you gon' die, die wit'

Strength

My family need a lil'

Strength

I prayed to GOD for

Strength

Give my people

Strength

Ima do it on tha

Strength

Kept it 100 on tha

Strength

Spent money on tha

Strength

Did it for my dawg on tha

Strength

I Know he'll do it for me on tha

Strength

Yeah nigga, Ima need tha whole

Strength



We gotta stick together as black people

If we come together, we'll have more strength

You see what happen to Miami and Houston

Yeah ya'll done forgot about Flint

I can't forget (swear to GOD)

Cuz I went and viewed it wit' my own eyes

I tried to help everybody I can

I'm pretty sure tha people realize (they understand)

I'm black and I'm proud, I wanna see my black sisters smile

I'm sick of black brothers dyin', Black Mama's cryin'

My Mama had to bury her son, that's tha hardest shit I ever seen her do

I had to bury my brother, that's tha hardest shit I been through



Strength

Grandma, she got

Strength

I know he'll do it for me on tha

Strength

Yeah nigga, Ima need tha whole

Strength



I can't prove my point no mo', I ain't got nobody to prove shit to

I ain't beefin' wit' broke niggas no mo', I ain't got nobody to do nothing to

All my young niggas, they successful, I ain't nobody to shoot nothing to

Everybody round me killin' shit, I ain't gotta worry bout who gon' do it

Race to tha murder, race to tha murder

Bruh I'ma do it, nah bruh I'ma do it

I'm successful, bruh I can't do it

Everybody runnin' to tha money, tryna sue me

I know them hatin' ass niggas wanna do me, shoot me shoot me, do me do me

Tha label told me calm down on tha gang shit, so I went and dropped that Booty



Strength
